mapper.select: SELECT d.decks_id AS deckId, d.decks_name AS deckName, GROUP_CONCAT(c.champion_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS championNames FROM decks d LEFT JOIN deck_champions_mapping dcm ON d.decks_id = dcm.deck_id LEFT JOIN champions_list c ON dcm.champion_id = c.champion_id GROUP BY d.decks_id, d.decks_name ORDER BY d.decks_id;
